message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $130 is a more reasonable price. Would you be willing to consider it?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $150, so how about $140?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about $135?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to give a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How about $145?
I appreciate your willingness to give a bit more, but I'm still not at a comfortable price. How about $137.50?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to give a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. How about $142.50?
I'm willing to meet you at $135, but if we can't agree on a price, I'll have to consider buying from someone else. Is this a deal?
